DOC.brief_title: Prospective Feasibility Trial AccuCath 2.25 '' BC Placed Difficult Access Patients Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: A one arm , prospective feasibility study use AccuCath 2.25 '' BC Intravascular Catheter System place upper arm ultrasound guidance , low arm without ultrasound guidance base clinical assessment . Subjects subject maximum 4 attempt . If unsuccessful 4th attempt , alternative consider per current standard care . Currently multiple IV attempt make difficult IV access patient without success . Patients often escalate invasive line due need long catheter without clinical indication . The study evaluate feasibility AccuCath 2.25 '' BC low risk , low cost alternative patient population lieu use midline , peripherally inserted central line central venous catheter clinically required purpose therapy .

Acceptable candidate elective , nonemergent peripheral IV determine order physician ; 5 . Admitted inpatient area minimum 24 hour , preferably average hospital length stay ; 6 .
